summary: This is an email chain from September 2019 discussing coordination among FBI personnel regarding victim assistance and updates in the Jeffrey Epstein case. It reveals the ongoing investigation, victim specialist involvement, and pressure from executive management for weekly updates.

events.title: Victim Specialist Coordination
events.description: Victim Specialist M sends a group email requesting updates on victim contact and services, noting the case is still an open investigation and that executive management requires weekly updates.

keyFacts: The email chain from September 2019 indicates the Epstein investigation was still active and open at that time.
A Victim Specialist from the New York Field Office was coordinating victim assistance and service referrals.
Executive management was requesting weekly updates on the case, indicating high-level oversight.
The correspondence shows efforts to contact victims and provide counseling services.
The email references attempts to connect with an individual in Phoenix and mentions a meeting in LA.
